page.title: 18FARMING (1)
page.content:
The main economic activity in the area is now farming. Most of the farms are long established and have been on their present sites for three to four hundred years. Many of the farm buildings still date from this period. A typical farm is {Treworlis Barton.} This farm is 75 acres in size. It has a mixture of farming activities. These include dairying, the growing of fodder and cash crops, the rearing of pigs and beef cattle and the keeping of poultry.
The labour on the farm is mainly provided by the farmer and his son who now have their two families living on the farm. A farm labourer is currently with them who is undergoing training. Occasionally casual labour is hired.
